issues.title: Ether send
issues.description:
In the function `_function_0x4229616d` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to an address taken from storage slot 5.
There is a check on storage index 5. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function '_function_0x67f809e9'.

There is a check on storage index 5. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function '_function_0x67f809e9'.
There is a check on storage index 1. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function 'fallback'.

issues.title: Exception state
issues.description: A reachable exception (opcode 0xfe) has been detected. This can be caused by type errors, division by zero, out-of-bounds array access, or assert violations. This is acceptable in most situations. Note however that assert() should only be used to check invariants. Use require() for regular input checking.

issues.title: Integer Overflow
issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `_function_0xfae14192`.
The addition may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.

issues.title: Integer Underflow
issues.description:
A possible integer underflow exists in the function `_function_0xd11f13df`.
The subtraction may result in a value < 0.

issues.title: Unchecked CALL return value
